name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Featuring a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and a 108MP quad camera setup. Perfect for photography enthusiasts and power users.

name: MacBook Pro M3
description: Powered by Apple's latest M3 chip, this MacBook Pro offers exceptional performance and battery life, ideal for professionals and creatives alike.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Experience industry-leading noise cancellation with high-resolution audio performance. Ideal for travel, work, or everyday use.

name: Apple iPad Pro
description: Features a stunning 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, M2 chip, and professional-level photography capabilities.

name: Google Pixel Watch
description: Google's first smartwatch offering seamless integration with Pixel phones, health tracking, and a stylish design.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: Combines a 15.6-inch 4K UHD touch display with a powerful 12th Gen Intel Core processor, making it ideal for both gaming and productivity.

name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
description: Offers unrivaled noise cancellation, personalized audio performance, and comfort. Perfect for music lovers on the go.
